pasal paddhathiye gunathmakabhawaya pawathwa genayama wenuwen sudusukam sahitha wishishta nayakathwa ha kalamanakarana hakiyawangen yuth widuhalpathiwarunge dayakathwaya labaganima pinisa adhyapana amathya, nithignya akila wiraj kariyawasam mathithumange upades paridi shri lanka widuhalpathi sewaye thunwani shreniyata nawaka widuhalpathiwarun 1858 k bandawaganimata pasugiya da piyawara ganu labu athara, ema widuhalpathiwarun sewarambhaka puhunuwa yomu kirima okthobar 02 sita aarambha kirimata katayuthu yoda atha. 2019-10-02 sita 2019-01-13 dina dakwa pawathwena mema sewarambhaka puhunuwa adiyara hatharakin kriyawata nanwena athara, ee anuwa, palamu adiyara yatathe mema shrenidhari widuhalpathiwarun puhunuwa sandaha liyapadinchi karaganima maharagama jathika adhyapana widyapitaye saha maharagama madhya maha widyalaye di adhyapana lekam em en ranasinha mahathage pradhanathwayen edina sidukere.
